item.title: D Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“Divilium, post:1, topic:289334”]Hey,
Ive got a code for D claws spec but I have 2 questions about it:
1st: can anyone see on this code what kind of server im running? (Delta or something) or tell me how else I can figure out?
2nd: Can someone help me make it attack 4 times intstead of twice?

[code]public void DragonClawsSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 16500) {
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(35);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(35);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 16500) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(35);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(0x426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}[/code]

Help please.

Thanks[/quote]

Type DCdown in search bar. Your code is for other server, not Delta.

Read full topic

item.title: D Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @Divilium Divilium
item.description:
@Divilium wrote:

Hey,
Ive got a code for D claws spec but I have 2 questions about it:
1st: can anyone see on this code what kind of server im running? (Delta or something) or tell me how else I can figure out?
2nd: Can someone help me make it attack 4 times intstead of twice?

[code]public void DragonClawsSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 16500) {
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(35);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(35);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 16500) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(35);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(0x426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}[/code]

Help please.

Thanks
